title: Remove “List Your Lease” CTA from Home page

requirements.text: Remove the "List Your Lease" call-to-action from the Home/Landing page hero section so the Home page no longer offers a direct "List Your Lease" path to the dashboard.

quotes: remove the list your lease on the home page

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx), the hero CTA row no longer contains a button/link with the label "List Your Lease".
The remaining hero CTA(s) (e.g., "Browse Available Leases") remain visually aligned and responsive on mobile and desktop.
No other pages/routes are removed or changed as part of this update.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose only).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not remove or disable the /dashboard route or any dashboard functionality.
Do not change backend logic, data models, or access control.
Do not add new marketing sections or redesign the Landing page beyond removing the specified CTA.
